sections.title: Ontology\b\tri\fen\bK-Portal\bConstruction\band\bK-Ser\fice\bPro\fision\b Asanee\bKawtrakul,\b\bCha\fee\fan\bPechsiri,\bTrakul\bPermpool,\b\tussadee\bTham\fijit,\b\b Phukao\bSornprasert,\bChaiyakorn\bYingsaeree,\bMukda\bSuktarachan\b
paragraphs: Departme\bt\tof\t\fomputer\tE\bgi\beeri\bg,\tKasetsart\tU\biversity,Thaila\bd\t ak@ku.ac.th,asa\bee_\baist@yahoo.com\t

\t Abstract\b \t K\bowledge\thas\tbee\b\tcrucial\tfor\tthe\tcou\btry’s\tdevelopme\bt\ta\bd\tbusi\bess\ti\btellige\bce,\twhere\tvaluable\tk\bowledge\tis\tdistributed\tover\t several\twebsites\twith\theteroge\beous\tformats.\tMoreover,\tfi\bdi\bg\tthe\t\beeded\ti\bformatio\b\tis\ta\tcomplex\ttask\tsi\bce\tthere\thas\tbee\b\tlack\tof\t sema\btic\trelatio\b\ta\bd\torga\bizatio\b.\t\t\tEve\b\tif\tit\thas\tbee\b\tfou\bd,\ta\b\toverload\tmay\toccur\tbecause\tthere\tis\t\bo\tco\bte\bt\tdigestio\b.\t\t This\tpaper\tfocuses\to\b\to\btology-drive\b\tk\bowledge\textractio\b\twith\t\batural\tla\bguage\tprocessi\bg\ttech\biques\ta\bd\ta\tframework\tof\tuserce\btric\tdesig\b\tfor\taccessi\bg\tthe\trequired\ti\bformatio\b\tbased\to\b\ttheir\tdema\bds.\t\tThese\tdema\bds\tca\b\tbe\texpressed\ti\b\tthe\tform\tof\tK\bowwhat,\tK\bow-why,\tK\bow-where,\tK\bow-whe\b,\tK\bow-how,\ta\bd\tK\bow-who\tfor\ta\tquestio\b\ta\bsweri\bg\tsystem\t \t

sections.title: 1. Introduction\b
paragraphs: \t

I\b\t order\t to\t u\bdersta\bd\t a\t situatio\b,\t a\t decisio\b-maker\t \beeds\t data,\t i\bformatio\b\t a\bd\t k\bowledge.\t The\t k\bowledge\t co\bsists\t of\t data\t items\t a\bd/or\t i\bformatio\b\t orga\bized\t a\bd\t processed\t to\t co\bvey\t u\bdersta\bdi\bg,\t experie\bce,\t a\bd\t expertise\tthat\tare\tapplicable\tfor\tproblem\tsolvi\bg\t(Turba\b\t et.\tal.,\t2005).\tHowever,\tsources\tof\tthese\tdata\tare\tscattered\t at\t several\t locatio\bs\t a\bd\t websites\t with\t heteroge\beous\t formats\tthat\toffer\tstructured\ti\bformatio\b\tto\tlarge\tvolumes\t of\t u\bstructured\t i\bformatio\b.\t Moreover,\t the\t \beeded\t k\bowledge\t has\t bee\b\t too\t difficult\t to\t fi\bd\t si\bce\t the\t traditio\bal\tsearch\te\bgi\bes\tretur\b\tra\bked\tretrieval\tlists\tthat\t offer\tlittle\tor\t\bo\ti\bformatio\b\to\b\tthe\tsema\btic\trelatio\bships,\t a\bd\teve\b\tif\tit\thas\tbee\b\tfou\bd,\tofte\b\toverload\tsi\bce\tthere\tis\t \bo\tco\bte\bt\tdigestio\b.\tAccordi\bgly,\tthe\tusers\tor\tk\bowledge\t workers\tmust\tspe\bd\ttime\tbrowsi\bg\ta\bd\treadi\bg\tto\tfi\bd\tout\t how\t various\ti\bformatio\b\tare\trelated\ta\bd\t where\teach\tfalls\t i\bto\toverall\tstructure\tof\tthe\tproblem\tdomai\b.\t\t

I\b\t this\t paper,\t we\t prese\bt\t a\t systematic\t attempt\t to\t co\bstruct\t the\t k\bowledge\t portal,\t which\t aims\t to\t i\btegrate\t a\bd\t orga\bize\t the\t data/i\bformatio\b\t resources\t dispersed\t across\tweb\tresources\ti\b\ta\tma\b\ber\tthat\tmakes\tthem\tuseful,\t a\bd\t a\t framework\t of\t user-ce\btric\t desig\b\t for\t accessi\bg\t the\t requested\t i\bformatio\b.\t Si\bce\t the\t web\t co\bsists\t of\t a\tlarge\t exte\bt\t of\t u\bstructured\t or\t semi-structure\t \batural\t la\bguage\t text,\t several\t tech\biques\t both\t i\b\t la\bguage\t &\t k\bowledge\t e\bgi\beeri\bg\t a\bd\t o\btology\t e\bgi\beeri\bg\t are\t applied\t to\t the\t k\bowledge\t portal\t co\bstructio\b.\t These\t i\bclude\t \bamede\btity\t recog\bitio\b\t (\fha\blekha\t a\bd\t Kawtrakul,\t 2004),\t discourse\t processi\bg\t (Grosz\t et.\t al.,\t 1995;\t Ko\bgwa\b\ta\bd\tKawtrakul,\t2005;\tWatta\bametha\bo\bt\tet.al.,\t 2005)\t i\bformatio\b\t extractio\b,\t k\bowledge\t discovery\t (Bloom,\t1956;\tPrather\tet.\tal.,\t1997;\t\tWah,\t1999;\tPechsiri\t a\bd\t Kawtrakul,\t 2005)\t a\bd\t o\btology\t mai\bte\ba\bce\t (Kawtrakul\tet.\tal.,\t2004).\t\t

The\t experime\bt\t is\t set-up\t i\b\t Pla\bt\t K\bowledge\t portal\t such\tas\tRice.\tThe\trelated\ti\bformatio\b\tabout\trice\tdispersed\t across\tweb\tresources\tco\bsisti\bg\tof\tvarieties,\tdisease,\tpest,\t rice\texporter,\tharvest\ttech\bology,\tweather\tforecast,\tetc.\t
\t
\t

sections.title: 2. System\bO\fer\fiew\b
paragraphs: \t

This\t paper\t focuses\t o\b\t o\btology\t drive\b\t i\bformatio\b\t extractio\b\t a\bd\t i\btegratio\b.\t At\t extractio\b\t level,\t taskorie\bted\t a\bd\t real-world\t taxo\bomy\t o\btology\t are\t used\tto\t co\bstruct\t i\bformatio\b\t schema\t a\bd\t sce\bario\t co\bstructio\b.\t At\ti\btegratio\b\tlevel,\tdema\bd-drive\b\tor\tpragmatic-orie\bted\t o\btology\t is\t used\t to\t aggregate\t i\bformatio\b\t from\t multiple\t heteroge\beous\tsources.\tThe\tdeveloped\tsystem\tis\tco\bsisted\t of\tthree\tmai\b\tcompo\be\bts\tas\tshow\b\ti\b\tFigure\t1.\t
\t

\t \t Figure\t1\tSystem\tOverview\t \b \b \b Orga\bizatio\b\tBased\t Distributed\tI\bformatio\b\tGatheri\bg\t K\bowledge\tPortal\t\fo\bstructio\b\t Macro-K\bowledge\t\fo\bstructio\b\t Micro-K\bowledge\tExtractio\b\t
RDF\t\t Warehouse\t Structured\t K\bowledge\t
&\t Rules\t K\bowledge\tService\tProvisio\b\t Query\t A\bsweri\bg\t K\bowledge\t Tracki\bg\t

Periodic\tweb\t crawler\t Metadata\t Extractio\b\t O\btology\t Acquisitio\b\t Task\t Orie\bted\t O\btology\t&\t\t Li\bguistic\t K\bowledge\t Gover\bme\bt\t Busi\bess\t Researchers\tFarmers\t Rice\t Disease\t K\bowledge\tExtractio\b\t

• \tistributed\b Information\b Gathering.\t The\t i\bformatio\b,\t both\t u\bstructured\t a\bd\t semi-structured\t docume\bts\tare\tgathered\tfrom\tma\by\tsources.\tPeriodic\t web\tcrawler\ta\bd\tHTML\tparser\t(Thamvijit\tet.al,\t2005)\t are\t used\t to\t collect\t a\bd\t orga\bize\t related\t i\bformatio\b.\t Domai\b-specific\t parser\t (Kawtrakul\t a\bd\t Yi\bgsaeree,\t 2005)\tare\tused\tto\textract\ta\bd\tge\berate\tmetadata\t\t\tfor\t i\bteroperability\t betwee\b\t disparate\t a\bd\t distributed\t i\bformatio\b.\t\bThe\toutput\tof\tthis\tstage\tis\treprese\bted\ti\b\t RDF\tformat.\t

• Knowledge\b Portal\b Construction.\t O\btologies\t are\t used\tas\ta\tkey\tto\tfacilitate\tboth\ti\bformatio\b\textractio\b\t a\bd\t i\btegratio\b.\bThere\t are\t two\t types\t of\t i\btegratio\b:\t summarize\t i\bto\t relatio\bal\t database;\t such\t as\t <Rice\t varieties\ba\bd\t yield,\bDisease\bdispersio\b,\bPest\t characteristics\t>,\ba\bd\t docume\bt\t hyperli\bk\t such\t as\t Product\t processi\bg,\t \fultural\t practice\t a\bd\t Fertilizi\bg.\t Additio\bally,\t the\t process\t of\t k\bowledge\t extractio\b\t from\t text\t is\t \beeded\t to\t pursue\t the\t goal\t of\t ge\berati\bg\t useful\tk\bowledge,\tsuch\tas\tge\beral\tsymptoms\tof\tpla\bt\t diseases,\tfrom\tthe\tlarge\tamou\bt\tof\ttext.\b\bThe\toutput\tof\t this\tstage\tis\bstructured\tk\bowledge\ta\bd\trules.\t

• Knowledge\b Ser\fice\b Pro\fision.\bFour\t differe\bt\t target\t users\t groups,\t i.e.,\t farmers,\t researchers,\t SME\t a\bd\t I\btellige\bt\t \fomma\bd\t \fe\btre,\t are\t disti\bguished\t by\t differe\bt\t viewpoi\bts\t that\t are\t characterized\t by\t each\t user’s\ti\bterest.\t\tAt\tthis\tstage,\tk\bowledge\ttracki\bg\ta\bd\t summarizatio\b\t are\t applied\t for\t k\bowledge\t service\t provisio\b.\tMoreover,\tK-service\ti\b\tthe\tform\tof\tK\bowwhat,\tK\bow-why,\tK\bow-where,\tK\bow-whe\b,\tK\bowhow,\ta\bd\tK\bow-who\thas\tbee\b\talso\tprovided.\t \t \t Three\tmultidiscipli\bary\tareas:\tLa\bguage\tE\bgi\beeri\bg\t such\t as\t word\t segme\btatio\b\t (Sudprasert\t a\bd\t Kawtrakul,\t 2003),\t \bamed\t e\btity\t recog\bitio\b\t (\fha\blekha\t a\bd\t Kawtrakul,\t 2004),\t shallow\t parsi\bg\t (Satayamas\t et.\t al.,\t 2005),\tshallow\ta\baphora\tresolutio\b\ta\bd\tdiscourse\t\t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t processi\bg\t (Ko\bgwa\b\t a\bd\t Kawtrakul,\t 2005),\t K\bowledge\t E\bgi\beeri\bg\t such\t as\t \t k\bowledge\t extractio\b\t (Pechsiri\t a\bd\t Kawtrakul,\t 2005),\t represe\btatio\b\t a\bd\t O\btology\t E\bgi\beeri\bg\t such\t as\t o\btology\t co\bstructio\b\t a\bd\t mai\bte\ba\bce\t(Kawtrakul\tet.\tal.,\t2004;\tKawtrakul\tet.\tal.,\t 2005),\tare\tapplied\tto\teach\tcompo\be\bt\tof\tk\bowledge\tportal\t co\bstructio\b.\t

sections.title: 3. Ontology\bdri\fen\bK-Portal\bConstruction\b
paragraphs: K\bowledge\t portal\t co\bstructio\b\t is\t \bot\t a\t trivial\t task\t si\bce\t i\bformatio\b\t is\t distributed\t i\b\t various\t i\bformatio\b\t sources.\t For\t example,\t the\t related\t i\bformatio\b\t about\t rice\t dispersed\t across\t web\t resources\t co\bsisti\bg\t of\t varieties,\t disease,\t pest,\t harvest\t tech\bology,\t weather\t forecasti\bg,\t disaster\t war\bi\bg,\t etc.\t He\bce,\t k\bowledge\t portal\t co\bstructio\b\t is\t a\t combi\batio\b\t model\t that\t refers\t to\tthe\t creatio\b\t of\t \bew\t explicit\t k\bowledge\t by\t extractio\b,\t i\btegratio\b,\t reaso\bi\bg\t a\bd\t sy\bthesizi\bg\t existi\bg\t explicit\t k\bowledge\tto\thelp\tusers\taccessi\bg\ti\bterrelated\tk\bowledge\t i\b\t a\t well-orga\bized\t form.\t This\t paper\t prese\bts\t a\t method\t for\t automatically\t co\bstructi\bg\t k\bowledge\t portal\t from\t electro\bic\t docume\bts\t by\t usi\bg\t two\t types\t of\t o\btology\t which\t are\t pragmatic-orie\bted\t o\btology\t a\bd\t task-orie\bted\t o\btology.\t

sections.title: 3.1. Pragmatic-oriented\b Ontology\b for\b Macro-Knowledge\bConstruction\b
paragraphs: Pragmatic-orie\bted\t o\btology\t mea\bs\t systemic\t a\bd\t
related\t topic\t map\t applied\t to\t aggregate\t expected\t
i\bformatio\b\t from\t multiple\t heteroge\beous\t sources.\t The\t
example\t of\t rice\t o\btology\t i\b\t pragmatic\t poi\bt\t of\t view\t for\t
aggregati\bg\t i\bformatio\b\t for\t o\be\t stop\t accessi\bg\t is\t show\b\t
i\b\tFigure\t2.\t\t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t
Figure\t2\tO\btology\tDrive\b\tRice\tPortal\t
\fo\bstructio\b\t

sections.title: 2336 3.2. Frame-based\b Ontology\b for\b Micro-Knowledge\bExtraction\b
paragraphs: Although\tmost\tof\tagricultural\tk\bowledge\tis\tco\btai\bed\t i\b\t electro\bic\t docume\bt,\t ma\bually\t readi\bg\t a\bd\t digesti\bg\t these\t docume\bts\t is\t time\t co\bsumi\bg.\t To\t solve\t this\t problem,\t i\bformatio\b\t extractio\b\t usi\bg\t task-orie\bted\t o\btology\t has\t bee\b\t developed\t to\t extract\t releva\bce\t i\bformatio\b\tfrom\tthose\tdocume\bts\ta\bd\treorga\bize\tit\ti\bto\ta\t well-defi\bed\tstructure\tformat.\tI\b\tthis\tsystem,\ttask-orie\bted\t o\btology\t is\t represe\bted\t i\b\t a\t frame\t a\bd\t slots\t scheme\t (Figure\t 3).\t Ma\bually\t desig\bed\t extractio\b\t rules\t are\talso\t required\tto\tguide\tthe\textractio\b\tprocess.\t

By\t usi\bg\t this\t predefi\bed\t k\bowledge\t together\t with\t \batural\t la\bguage\t processi\bg\t tech\biques,\t the\t i\bformatio\b\t extractio\b\t process\t co\btai\bs\t two\t mai\b\t steps\t as\t the\t followi\bg:\t • Pre-processing:\t This\t process\t performs\t la\bguage\t
processi\bg\t co\bsisti\bg\t of\t word\t segme\btatio\b,\t \bame\t
e\btity\t recog\bitio\b,\t \bou\b\t phrase\t a\balysis,\t a\bd\t
heuristic-based\t a\baphora\t a\bd\t ellipsis\t resolutio\b\t
(Ko\bgwa\b,\t2005).\t \t
\t
Figure\t3\tA\b\tExample\tof\tRice_Variety\tFrame\ta\bd\tSlot\t Scheme\t
\t

• Information\bextraction:\bThe\tobjective\tof\tthis\tstep\tis\t to\textract\trequired\ti\bformatio\b\tbased\to\b\ttask-orie\bted\t o\btology\ta\bd\tpredefi\bed\textractio\b\trules.\tThe\texample\t of\textracted\ti\bformatio\b\tis\tshow\b\ti\b\tFigure\t4.\b
\b
\b
Figure\t4\tA\b\tExample\tof\tExtractio\b\tResult\b \b \b \b

sections.title: 3.3. Knowledge\bExtraction\b
paragraphs: I\b\t this\t work,\t our\t k\bowledge\t extractio\b\t system\t will\t mai\bly\t focus\t o\b\t causality\t k\bowledge,\t existi\bg\t betwee\b\t causative\t a\btecede\bt\t a\bd\t effective\t co\bseque\bt\t discourse\t u\bits.\t Mi\bi\bg\t K\bow-Why\t or\t expla\batio\b\t k\bowledge\t will\t i\bduce\ta\tk\bowledge\tof\treaso\bi\bg\tthat\tis\tbe\beficial\tfor\tour\t daily\tuse\ti\b\tdiag\bosis.\t
Framework\bfor\bCausality\bExtraction\b To\t extract\t a\t causative\t u\bit\t a\bd\t its\t effective\t
i\bformatio\b\tu\bit\ti\b\tthe\tform\tof\ta\b\ti\btra-causal\tEDU\tor\ta\b\t
i\bter-causal\t EDU,\t there\t are\t three\t mai\b\t tasks\t as\t the\t
followi\bg\t(\fhaveevar\b,\tet.al.,\tSNLP\t2005)\t:\t

• Pre-processing:\t This\t process\t provides\t word\t segme\btatio\b,\t part\t of\t speech\t taggi\bg,\t i\bcludi\bg\t Named\t e\btity\t recog\bitio\b,\t word-formatio\b\t recog\bitio\b\t (Pe\bgpho\b\t et.\t al.,\t 2002)\t to\t solve\t the\t bou\bdary\t of\t Nou\b\t phrase\t a\bd\t EDU\t segme\btatio\b\t (\fhareo\bsuk\tet.\tal.,\t2005).\t\t

• Causality\bLearning:\tThis\ttask\tis\tto\tlear\b\tcause-effect\t expressio\b\t betwee\b\t causative\t eve\bts\t a\bd\t effective\t eve\bts\t from\t the\t corpus.\t This\t expressio\b\t ca\b\t be\t expressed\t by\t the\t combi\batio\b\t of\t verb\t pairs\t from\t differe\bt\t EDUs\t or\t by\t a\t lexical\t pair\t from\t a\t lexico\t sy\btactic\t patter\b\t withi\b\t o\be\t EDU.\t I\b\t the\t verb\t pair\t expressio\b,\t o\be\t eve\bt\t verb\t is\t the\t causative\t verb(vc)\t from\t a\t causative\t EDU.\t The\t other\t eve\bt\t verb\t is\t the\t effective\t verb\t or\t result\t verb(ve)\t from\t a\b\t effective\t EDU.\t For\t the\t lexical\t pair,\t the\t causative\t a\bd\t the\t effective\teve\bts\tare\tdetermi\bed\tfrom\tthe\t\bou\b\tphrases\t prese\bted\ti\b\tthe\tlexico\tsy\btactic\tpatter\b\tof\to\be\tEDU.\t

• Causality\brecognition\band\bextraction:\tThe\tobjective\t of\tthis\ttask\tis\tto\textract\tthe\tcause-effect\trelatio\b\tfrom\t a\b\t i\bput\t text.\t There\t are\t two\t mai\b\t steps\t as\t i\b\t the\t followi\bg:\t\t o \fause-effect\t Ide\btificatio\b:\t This\t step\t is\t to\t ide\btify\t the\t causative\t u\bit\t by\t searchi\bg\t a\by\t eleme\bt\t i\b\tVc\tfrom\tthe\tcause-effect\tverb\tpairs\t(for\tthe\t i\btercausal\tEDU)\ta\bd\ta\by\teleme\bt\ti\b\tthe\tverb-phrase\tcue\t set\talo\bg\twith\tlexical\tpairs\t(for\tthe\ti\btra-causal\tEDU)\t from\t the\t causality\t lear\bi\bg\t step.\t For\t the\t basic\t EDU\t that\t co\btai\bs\t a\b\t embedded\t EDU,\t paraphrasi\bg\t is\t required\tbefore\tsearchi\bg.\t o \fause-effect\t Bou\bdary\t Determi\batio\b:\t This\t bou\bdary\t determi\batio\b\t will\t be\t applied\t o\bly\t i\b\t the\t i\bter-causal\t EDUs.\t The\t determi\batio\b\t co\btai\bs\t 2\t mai\b\t approaches,\t applyi\bg\t the\t cue\t phrase\t a\bd\t the\t ce\bteri\bg\ttheory.\t\fue\tphrase\tis\tused\tfor\tide\btifyi\bg\ta\t causality\t bou\bdary.\t There\t are\t 2\t ki\bds\t of\t the\t cue\t phrases,\tas\tthe\tverb-phrase\tcue\tset\ta\bd\tthe\tdiscoursemarker\t cue\t set,\t as\t show\b\t below.\t \t The\t ce\bteri\bg\t theory\twill\tbe\tapplied\twhe\b\tthe\timplicit\tcue\tphrase\tis\t recog\bized.\t o \t <Rice_variety>:=\t Variety_\bame:\tlist\tvalue\t Rice_type:\t{\b /Rice,\t\t\f/Sticky\tRice}\̂t Farmi\bg_system:\t{ /off-seaso\b\trice field,\t /i\b seaso\b\trice\tfield}\̂t Harvest_time:\t\bumeric\tvalue\t\t-\t Average_yield:\t\bumeric\tvalue\t\t-\t Irresistible_pest/disease:\tsymbolic\tvalue\t*\t Resistible_pest/disease:\tsymbolic\tvalue\t*\t Area_co\bditio\b:\tsymbolic\tvalue*\t Note\t:\t\̂treprese\bts\to\bly\to\be\tvalue\t \t -\treprese\bts\to\bly\to\be\tvalue\tor\tthe\toptio\bal\tvalue.\t \t *\treprese\bts\tzero\tvalue\tor\tma\by\tvalues\t <Rice_variety>:=\t Variety_\bame:\t . 1/Khao\tYipu\b\tDOA1,\t .2/Khao\tYipu\b\tDOA2\t\t Rice_type:\t\b /Rice\t Farmi\bg_system:\t /off-seaso\b\trice\tfield\t Harvest_time:\t90 /day\t\t-\t Average_yield:\t500\t / kg/1600m2
\t\t-\t Irresistible_pest/disease:\t0\t\t Resistible_pest/disease:\tBaka\bae\t Area_co\bditio\b:\thigh\tla\bd\t
Figure\t5\tA\b\tExample\tof\timplicit\tcue\tphrase\t

\b \t\t\t\t\tThis\t theory\t relates\t to\t the\t focus\t of\t atte\btio\b\twithi\b\t a\t discourse\t segme\btatio\b\t(Grosz\t et.\t al.,1995)\t to\t determi\be\t the\tsmooth\tshift\toccurre\bce.\t \t\t\t\t\tTo\t evaluate\t the\t system,\t we\t use\t docume\bts\t co\btai\bi\bg\t 3000\t se\bte\bces\t from\t the\t Departme\bt\t of\t Agricultural\t Exte\bsio\b\t corpus.\t Our\t model\t of\t causality\t extractio\b\t shows\t the\t precisio\b\t a\bd\t recall\t of\t 86%\t a\bd\t 70%\t respectively,\twhere\tour\tevaluatio\b\tis\tbased\to\b\tthe\texpert’s\t results.\t\t \t

sections.title: 4. K-Ser\fice\bPro\fision\b
paragraphs: Four\t differe\bt\t target\t users\t group\t are\t disti\bguished\t
from\t the\t differe\bt\t poi\bts\t of\t views\t depe\bdi\bg\t o\b\t their\t
objective,\ti\bterest,\taffectatio\b\ta\bd\tbe\befit.\t\t
• The\tfarmers\trequire\tsome\tuseful\ti\bformatio\b,\ti.e.\thow\t to\t a\balyze\t the\t type\t of\t pests,\t or\t symptom\t of\t pla\bt\t diseases\ta\bd\thow\tto\tprotect\tpla\bt\tfrom\tdiseases,\t
• The\t researchers\t prefer\t to\t track\t the\t problems\t a\bd\t literate\tthe\tprevious\tresearches,\t
• Small\t a\bd\t Medium\t E\bterprise\t requires\t to\t follow\t up\t the\tstate\tof\tbusi\bess,\t

• I\btellige\bt\t \fomma\bd\t \fe\bter\t of\t the\t Gover\bme\bt\t \beeds\t portal\t of\t Executive\t i\bformatio\b,\t cross\t sector\t a\balysis,\ta\bd\tI\btellige\bt\tReal-time\twar\bi\bgs/\talerts\tor\t eve\bt\ttracki\bg.\t Accordi\bgly,\t K-service\t provisio\b\t co\bsists\t of\t\t

sections.title: 4.1\b Question\bAnswering\b\b
paragraphs: U\blike\t\bormal\ti\bformatio\b\tretrieval\tsystems\tor\tsearch\t e\bgi\bes,\tQA\tca\b\tsupply\tusers\twith\tthe\tsatisfy\ti\bformatio\b\t i\bstead\t of\t providi\bg\t just\t a\t list\t of\t searchi\bg\t result.\t Moreover\t the\t QA\t is\t a\b\t effective\t tech\bique\t to\t solve\tthe\t task\tof\tpatter\bs\ta\bd\ttemplates\tprocessi\bg\tthat\twere\tdrive\b\t by\t o\btology.\t I\b\t this\t research\t QA\t is\t applied\t for\t the\t applicatio\bs\tbelow.\t 4.1.1. Know-what\b

I\b\t Agricultural\t domai\b,\t the\t Object-Property\t k\bowledge,\tsuch\tas\tpest’s\tcharacteristics\t(color,\tsize,\ta\bd\t etc),\t is\t a\t useful\t k\bowledge\t that\t serves\t the\t “What”\t questio\b\tfor\ta\tfarmer\tor\ta\b\tagriculturalist,\tfor\texample\t\t
“What\tis\tki\bd\tof\tthe\ti\bsect,\tthat\tits\tbody\tis\tblack,\tsize\t
is\tabout\t2\tmillimeter\tlo\bg?”\t

I\b\torder\tto\ta\bswer\tthe\tquestio\b\teffectively,\tthe\tsystem\t \beeds\tto\tha\bdle\tthe\tfuzzy\tvalue\tof\tthe\tobject’s\tproperties\t such\tas\t“approximately\t2\tmillimeter”,\t“light\tgree\b”,\t“dark\t red”.\tTo\tha\bdle\tthese\tproblems,\twe\tuse\tthe\tfuzzy\tco\bcept\t for\t represe\bti\bg\t the\t property\t value\t i\b\t Object-Property\t k\bowledge.\t \t I\b\t order\t to\t a\bswer\t the\t query,\t we\t use\t the\t similarity\tfu\bctio\b\tto\tretrieve\tthe\ta\bswer\t(Ko\bgkwa\b\tet.al,\t 2005).\t Based\t o\b\t 440\t se\bte\bces\t experime\bt,\t the\t precisio\b\t of\tthe\tsystem\tis\t88.88%\ta\bd\tthe\trecall\tis\t47.05%.\t 4.1.2. Know-who\b

Fi\bdi\bg\t a\b\t appropriate\t perso\b\t for\t solvi\bg\t some\t specific\t problems\t is\t a\t complicated\t task.\t For\t example,\t whe\b\ta\tfarmer\twa\bts\tto\tfi\bd\ta\b\texpert\twho\tk\bows\thow\tto\t co\btrol\t a\t rice\t blast,\t he/she\t may\t ask\t the\t system\t with\t the\t query\t“Who\tis\trice\tblast\texpert?”\tThe\tsystem\twill\tprocess\t that\tquery\ta\bd\tretur\b\ta\tlist\tof\trice\tblast\texperts\tto\thim/her\t co\btai\bi\bg\t expert’s\t \bame,\t positio\b,\t affiliatio\b,\t area\t of\t expert,\ta\bd\tco\btacti\bg\taddress.\tThe\texample\tof\tthe\toutput\t from\tthe\tsystem\tmay\tlook\tlike\tthis:\t \t Name:\tTheerayut\tTooji\bda\t Positio\b\t:Research\tScie\btist\t Affiliatio\b:\tKasetsart\tU\biversity\t Email\taddress\t:\tTheerayut@d\ba.kps.ku.ac.th\t Expert\tfield\t:\tRI\fE\tBREEDING/\tMARKER\tAIDED\t SELE\fTION\t\t \t Name\t:\tLadha,\tJ.K.\t Positio\b\t:se\bior\tresearcher\t Work\tplace\t:\tIRRI\tI\bdia\tOffice,NAS\f\t\fomplex,DPS\t Marg,\tPusa,New\tDelhi\t110012,I\bdia\t\t Email\taddress\t:\tj.k.ladha@cgiar.org\t\t\t Expert\tfield\t:\tSoil\tfertility,\tpla\bt\t\butritio\b,\tbiological\t N2\tfixatio\b,\trice-wheat\tsystem.\t \t Name\t:\tBarma\b,\tBhuba\beswar\t Postio\b\t:\t\fhief\tScie\btist\t Affiliatio\b\t :\t Assam\t Agricultural\t U\biversity\t ,RARS,\t Shillo\bga\bi,\tNagao\b,\tAssam,\tINDIA\t\t Email\taddress\t:\t\tbrrihq@bdo\bli\be.com\t Expert\tfield\t:cereals\ta\bd\tgrai\bs\t\t

Figure\t6\tA\b\tExample\tof\t\tK\bow-who\tresult\t 4.1.3. Know-why\b \t\t\t\t\t\t\tThis\t k\bowledge-questio\b\t is\t very\t importa\bt\t for\t the\t diag\bosis\t a\bd\t preve\btive\t system\t because\t k\bowi\bg\t the\t cause\t is\t releva\bt\t for\t problem\t solvi\bg.\t \t For\t example:\t the\t Blast\tdisease\tis\ta\b\tawful\tdisease\tfor\trice\tfarmi\bg.\t\tThe\b,\t farmers\twill\thave\tsome\tquestio\bs\tas\t\t
“How do we k\bow w\tet\ter \ft \fs t\te Blast
d\fsease? a\bd W\tat \fs t\te causat\fo\b?”\t\t\t Our\tsystem\twill\ta\bswer\tas\t\t
“W\te\b t\te d\fsease prese\bts, r\fce w\fll s\tow
symptoms o\b you\bg leaves of t\fller\f\bg pla\bts
\f\b\ft\fally appear\f\bg as small w\t\ft\fs\t-gray or dark,
redd\fs\t-brow\b spots. I\b severe cases, e\bt\fre
pla\bts may be defol\fated, become stu\bted a\bd
d\fe. A\bd R\fce blast \fs caused by t\te blast
fu\bgus.”\t\t\t However,\tour\tsystem\twill\tbe\tbe\beficial\tto\tthe\tpeople\twho\t look\tfor\tthe\treaso\bi\bg\tk\bowledge,\twith\t86%\tprecisio\b\ta\bd\t 70%\trecall.\t\t \t \t

sections.title: 2338 4.2\b\b E\fent\bTracking\b
paragraphs: I\b\t order\t to\t fulfill\t k\bowledge\t service\t provisio\b,\t we\t also\t provide\t tracki\bg\t system\t called\t Eve\bt\t Tracki\bg.\t\t Figure\t 5\t shows\t \t the\t example\t of\t “dispersal”\t a\bd\t “preve\btio\b”\t Frame\t of\t disease\t that\t modified\t from\t\t\t (http://frame\bet.icsi.berkeley.edu/\t).\t\t

To\t track\t the\t eve\bts,\t we\t \beed\t to\t k\bow\t \b-tuple\t i\bformatio\b\t i\bcludi\bg\t time\t dime\bsio\b\t such\t as\t the\t dispersal\t of\t rice\t blast,\t we\t \beed\t to\t k\bow\t 3-tuples\t i\bformatio\b\tco\bsisti\bg\tof\tplace,\ttime\ta\bd\tresult.\t\t \t 1 1 1 2 2 2

sections.title: 5. Conclusion\band\bFuture\bwork\b
paragraphs: \t

This\twork\tis\tthe\tresearch\to\b-dema\bd\tthat\twe\tgot\tthe\t requireme\bt\t from\t the\t e\bd-users.\t To\t co\bstruct\t k\bowledge\t portal,\t two\t type\t of\t e\bgi\beeri\bg\t is\t required\t as\t basic\t eleme\bts,\t which\t are\t la\bguage\t e\bgi\beeri\bg,\t a\bd\t o\btology\t e\bgi\beeri\bg.\t For\t the\t curre\bt\t prototypi\bg,\t o\btology\tis\t modified\t from\t Frame\t \bet\t a\bd\t predefi\bed\t ma\bually.\t For\t the\t \bext\t step,\t o\btology\t will\t be\t semi-automatically\t co\bstructed\tby\tusi\bg\ta\tvariety\tof\ttermi\bological\tresources,\t such\tas\traw\ttext,\tdictio\baries\ta\bd\tthesauri.\t\t\t
